document_data.name: Evelyn Doeskin
document_data.mainbody: '''Evelyn Doeskin''' was a [[druid]]ess of [[Mielikki]] in [[northeast Faerûn]] around the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Abilities: Evelyn was capable of casting the [[spell]]s ''[[barkskin]]'', ''[[charm person or mammal]]'', ''[[cure light wounds]]'', ''[[entangle]]'', ''[[faerie fire]]'', ''[[goodberry]]'', ''[[invisibility to animals]]'', ''[[speak with animals]]'', and ''[[summon insects]]''.
document_data.Possessions: Evelyn wore a suit of [[leather armor]] and carried around a wooden ''+1 [[shield]]''. In terms of weaponry, she carried a [[scimitar]] and a [[sling]] with [[lead]] [[bullet]]s.
document_data.History: At some point in the 14{{th}} century DR, Evelyn was instructed by [[Mielikkian]] superiors to wander through the swampy forests of [[Vaasa]] in order to learn whatever she could about the [[Cult of the Dragon]]'s activity there. Over the first two days, the only things she managed to occasionally encounter were [[boar]]s, [[snake]]s, and [[troll]]s.
